The world is fevering amid global crisis; economic indexes are depending on oil world prices. The permanent changes of oil market are profitable for USA only what by this way has got a chance to sort it out with her sworn rivals (EU, China, India and other)! Sure, Washington uses control over oil price formation (in wholly subdued OPEK as well) as 'weapon' of economy containment.
 Some European analysts think that creation of 'alternative' OPEK by producer countries what aren't part of this organization could stabilize the situation at the oil market. 
 And of course it will be conductive in going world economy out of the present crisis!

post_info.post_title: The permanent changes of oil market are profitable for USA
